bioAsHtml:
Elke Steegmans is a lecturer in Applied Computer Science at the UCLL where she teaches software- and web development and does research on software testing.

She received her PhD in Computer Science from the Catholic University Of Leuven.

She is a passionate teacher and as a member of study the programme committee she always strives to improve the educational programme.

acceptedTalks.title: Bridging the communication gap: can tools help?
From TDD to BDD and back; your guide on building a complete test automation stack

bio:
Elke Steegmans is a lecturer in Applied Computer Science at the UCLL where she teaches software- and web development and does research on software testing. 

She received her PhD in Computer Science from the Catholic University Of Leuven. 

She is a passionate teacher and as a member of study the programme committee she always strives to improve the educational programme.
